## How to use

Fill me in please! Donâ€™t forget code examples:

``` python
# Example usage
ploidy = 2
n_chromosomes = 10
n_loci_per_chr = 100

random_haplotype = torch.randint(0, 2, (ploidy, n_chromosomes, n_loci_per_chr))
ind = Individual(haplotypes=random_haplotype)
print(ind)
ind.allele_dosage()
```
